tool.name: plink

param.name: allow_missing
param.label: Missing data proportion
param.help: Allowed missing data proportion per site. Must be comprised between 0 and 1.

param.name: chromosomes
param.label: Chromosomes
param.help: Chromosomes to be analyzed. (Comma-separated list of reference sequences, ex: Chr1,Chr2)

param.name: bound_start
param.label: Lower bound
param.help: Lower bound for a range of sites to be processed.

param.name: bound_end
param.label: Upper bound
param.help: Upper bound for a range of sites to be processed.
